lucien - (27/07/2009 11:07): Hi all,  
lucien - (27/07/2009 11:07): xwiki-shared-test-1.6 doesn't work with a 2.0-SNAPSHOT core (Container.ROLE, ExecutionContextManager.ROLE, Execution.ROLE are not defined), someone can fix that ?  
tmortagne left at 11:09 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
sdumitriu - (27/07/2009 11:21): lucien: You should not mix different versions of modules  
sdumitriu - (27/07/2009 11:21): Why don't you use xwiki-shared-test-2.0-SNAPSHOT?  
lucien - (27/07/2009 11:21): i can't find it  
sdumitriu left at 11:22 ("Leaving.")  
lucien - (27/07/2009 11:23): ok got it  
lucien - (27/07/2009 11:24): seems that this module is duplicated (both in core and xwiki-tools)  
tmortagne\_ - (27/07/2009 11:34): lucien: the one in tools is the old one  
lucien - (27/07/2009 11:35): ok  
tmortagne\_ - (27/07/2009 11:35): we made it a core project for 1.9 or  1.8

lucien - (27/07/2009 15:01): Which modules are using JMock for unit tests ?  
vmassol - (27/07/2009 15:02): lucien: several, just look for jmock in pom.xml  
vmassol - (27/07/2009 15:03): lucien:  in platform, run  find . -name "pom.xml" -exec grep -H "jmock" {} \;  
lucien - (27/07/2009 15:04): ok thanks
